select t.* from ( select itemCode , itemName, itemContent, price, normPrice,itemImg1,itemChr,classCode, idNo ,regDate,saleStat, (select count(itemCode)from t_order_history where t_item.itemCode=t_order_history.itemCode) orderCount from t_item order by orderCount DESC )t where
ROWNUM<10

select rl.* from( select r.itemCode, t.itemChr, t.itemName, t.price, t.normPrice,t.saleStat from ( select itemcode ,avg(score) reviewAvg , count(itemCode) reviewCnt from t_review group by itemcode order by reviewAvg DESC , reviewCnt DESC )r , t_item t where r.itemCode= t.itemCode) rl where
ROWNUM<10
